tit.j: くずは・男山循環コミュニティバス

sen.j: くずは・男山循環コミュニティバス（くずは・おとこやまじゅんかんコミュニティバス）は、京阪宇治交通が『バスビィ』として運行を開始したコミュニティバスである。
sen.e: The Kuzuha/Otokoyama Loop-Route Community Bus is the community oriented bus route, which started its operation by the Keihan Uji Transport Co. Ltd. with the public nickname of the service as 'Bus-be.'
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: The Kuzuha/Otokoyama Loop-Route Community Bus is the community oriented bus route, which started its operation by the Keihan Uji Transport Co. Ltd. with the public nickname of the service as 'Bus-be.'

The Kuzuha/Otokoyama Loop-Route Community Bus is the community oriented bus route, which started its operation by the Keihan Uji Transport Co. Ltd. with the public nickname of the service as 'Bus-be.'

sen.j: 現在は京阪宇治交通と合併した京阪バスが運行を継承している。
sen.e: Later, the Keihan Bus Co. Ltd. took over the management of the Keihan Uji Transport Co. Ltd., and succeeded the operation of this route.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: Later, the Keihan Bus Co., Ltd. took over the management of the Keihan Uji Transport Co., Ltd. and succeeded the operation of this route.
Later, the Keihan Bus Co., Ltd. took over the management of the Keihan Uji Transport Co., Ltd. and succeeded the operation of this route.

sen.j: 路線名は『くずは線・くずは男山団地循環線』（京阪バス合併後）である。
sen.e: The official name of this route is the 'Kuzuha Route/Kuzuha Otokoyama Housing Complex Loop-Route' (this is the official name of the route after the takeover of the management by the Keihan Bus Co. Ltd.)

The official name of this route is the "Kuzuha Route/Kuzuha Otokoyama Housing Complex Loop-Route" (this is the official name of the route after the takeover of the management by the Keihan Bus Co. Ltd.)
sen.cmt: 原文の『』に合せて'を"に訂正しました。
sen.e: The official name of this route is the "Kuzuha Route/Kuzuha Otokoyama Housing Complex Loop-Route" (this is the official name of the route after the takeover of the management by the Keihan Bus Co. Ltd.)

sen.j: 京阪バス男山営業所の管轄である。
sen.e: This route is currently managed by the Keihan Bus Otokoyama Management Office.
This route is currently managed by the Keihan Bus Otokoyama Management Office.
This route is currently managed by the Keihan Bus Otokoyama Management Office.

sen.j: 概要
sen.e: Summary
Summary
Summary

sen.j: 旧・京阪宇治交通の路線を含めた京阪バスの中では最も古いコミュニティバスである。
sen.e: This is the oldest community bus in service since the establishment of the Keihan Bus Co. Ltd. (including the period of the former Keihan Uji Transport Co. Ltd.)
This is the oldest community bus in service since the establishment of the Keihan Bus Co. Ltd. (including the period of the former Keihan Uji Transport Co. Ltd.).
sen.cmt: ピリオド位置を訂正しました。
sen.e: This is the oldest community bus in service since the establishment of the Keihan Bus Co. Ltd. (including the period of the former Keihan Uji Transport Co. Ltd.).

sen.j: このバスの運行経路は狭隘部を通過するが、最寄の停留所より半径300mも離れていない場所を通過する。
sen.e: This bus route goes through areas with some narrow roads and streets; however, those areas are situated within 300m radius from the nearest bus stops, since those bus stops are distributed close enough each other to make the advanced age users accessible.
sen.cmt: 原文の意味するところがこの続きのセルを読まない限り不明です。(読んでもこの文章そのものの意味は分からないのですが） このためこのセルの訳はどうしてもこれだけでは意味不明になります。分割した方が少なくともわかりやすくなると思います。原文にはないですが、後ほどのセルで出てくる「停留所間隔を狭くする」ことに関して、括弧で説明として加えました。原文：「このバスの運行経路が狭隘部を通過するとはいえ、最寄の停留所より半径300mも離れていない場所を通過することから、高齢者のバス利用に関する実証実験として開設されている。」一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: This bus route goes through areas with some narrow roads and streets; however, those areas are situated within 300m radius from the nearest bus stops, since those bus stops are distributed close enough each other to make the advanced age users accessible.

This bus route goes through areas with some narrow roads and streets; however, those areas are situated within 300m radius from the nearest bus stops, since those bus stops are distributed close enough each other to make the advanced age users accessible.

sen.j: 高齢者のバス利用に関する実証実験として開設された。
sen.e: This route was established as a real-world testing for conducting a research on the usage of a bus system by advanced age users.
This route was established as a real-world testing for conducting a research on the usage of a bus system by advanced age users.
This route was established as a real-world testing for conducting a research on the usage of a bus system by advanced age users.

sen.j: この証左として、この時期に『バスビィ介護サービス』の事業が開始されている。
sen.e: For the actual demonstration of this research, the 'Bus-be Nursing Care Service Project' was also started at the same time.
For the actual demonstration of this research, the "Bus-be Nursing Care Service Project" was also started at the same time.
sen.cmt: 原文の『』に合せて'を"に訂正しました。
sen.e: For the actual demonstration of this research, the "Bus-be Nursing Care Service Project" was also started at the same time.

sen.j: 設定に際しては地元住民の他にも大阪工業大学教授の意見や提案なども取り入れた。
sen.e: For setting up this project, not only those ideas and proposals suggested by a professor of the Osaka Institute of Technology, but also the comments of the local residents were taken into consideration.

For setting up this project, not only those ideas and proposals suggested by a professor of the Osaka Institute of Technology, but also the comments of the local residents were taken into consideration.

For setting up this project, not only those ideas and proposals suggested by a professor of the Osaka Institute of Technology, but also the comments of the local residents were taken into consideration.

sen.j: この内の一つが「利便性の確保と高齢者対策の観点から、団地内の停留所間隔を100m毎にする」と言う提案であった。
sen.e: One of the proposals to be carried out was "to keep the distance of each bus stop as 100m within the housing complex area, considering the convenience and the accessibility by the advanced age residents of this area."

One of the proposals to be carried out was 'to keep the distance of each bus stop as 100m within the housing complex area, considering the convenience and the accessibility by the advanced age residents of this area.'
sen.cmt: 原文の「」に合せて"を'に訂正しました。
sen.e: One of the proposals to be carried out was 'to keep the distance of each bus stop as 100m within the housing complex area, considering the convenience and the accessibility by the advanced age residents of this area.'

sen.j: このため318棟前→男山商店街西間は概ね100m間隔で停留所を設置した。
sen.e: According to this proposal, the distance of each bus stop placed between No. 318 Apartment Front and Otokoyama Shopping district West was set up in 100m intervals.
According to this proposal, the distance of each bus stop placed between No. 318 Apartment Front and Otokoyama Shopping district West was set up in 100m intervals.
According to this proposal, the distance of each bus stop placed between No. 318 Apartment Front and Otokoyama Shopping district West was set up in 100m intervals.

sen.j: 経路番号は当初より5系統（現在の男山5号経路）である。
sen.e: The route number of this bus service has been the No. 5 Route since the establishment of this route. (the current official name is the Otokoyama No. 5 Route)
The route number of this bus service has been the No. 5 Route since the establishment of this route (the current official name is the Otokoyama No. 5 Route).
sen.cmt: ピリオド位置を訂正しました。
sen.e: The route number of this bus service has been the No. 5 Route since the establishment of this route (the current official name is the Otokoyama No. 5 Route).

sen.j: 2003年春頃に『バスビィ』から現在の名称に変更される際に、106棟前停留所からあさひ停留所間の経路（開設当初は、『106棟前→101棟前→しで原→公園前→あさひ』であった）が変更された。
sen.e: In the spring of 2003, the nickname of this bus service was changed from the 'Bus-be' to the current name, the "Kuzuha/Otokoyama Loop-Route Community Bus," and the route of the bus service was also revised at the same time, for the section of the route between No. 106 Apartment Front and Asahi bus stops. (the original route of this section was running via "No. 106 Apartment Front - No. 101 Apartment Front - Shidehara - Park Front - Asahi")

In the spring of 2003, the nickname of this bus service was changed from the "Bus-be" to the current name, the Kuzuha/Otokoyama Loop-Route Community Bus, and the route of the bus service was also revised at the same time, for the section of the route between No. 106 Apartment Front and Asahi bus stops (the original route of this section was running via "No. 106 Apartment Front - No. 101 Apartment Front - Shidehara - Park Front - Asahi.")
sen.cmt: 原文の『』に合せて'を"に訂正しました。" "削除しました。ピリオド位置を訂正しました。
sen.e: In the spring of 2003, the nickname of this bus service was changed from the "Bus-be" to the current name, the Kuzuha/Otokoyama Loop-Route Community Bus, and the route of the bus service was also revised at the same time, for the section of the route between No. 106 Apartment Front and Asahi bus stops (the original route of this section was running via "No. 106 Apartment Front - No. 101 Apartment Front - Shidehara - Park Front - Asahi.")

sen.j: なお旧・京阪宇治交通時代の正式路線名は「男山団地内回り」（おとこやまだんちないまわり）と称していた。
sen.e: By the way, the official name of this bus route during the Keihan Uji Transport Co. Ltd. period was the "Otokoyama Housing Complex Route Internal Bound."
By the way, the official name of this bus route during the Keihan Uji Transport Co., Ltd. period was the 'Otokoyama Housing Complex Route Internal Bound.'
sen.cmt: ,補足しました。原文の「」に合せて"を'に訂正しました。
sen.e: By the way, the official name of this bus route during the Keihan Uji Transport Co., Ltd. period was the 'Otokoyama Housing Complex Route Internal Bound.'

sen.j: なお2003年頃に国土交通省より「導入効果の見られたコミュニティバス」にリストアップされた（参考文献より）。
sen.e: This bus route was named as "the effective community bus route upon its introduction" by the Ministry of Land, Infrastructure and Transport in 2003, among those community buses operated throughout Japan. (according to the reference documents)

This bus route was named as 'the effective community bus route upon its introduction' by the Ministry of Land, Infrastructure and Transport in 2003, among those community buses operated throughout Japan (according to the reference documents).
sen.cmt: 原文の「」に合せて"を'に訂正しました。ピリオド位置を訂正しました。
sen.e: This bus route was named as 'the effective community bus route upon its introduction' by the Ministry of Land, Infrastructure and Transport in 2003, among those community buses operated throughout Japan (according to the reference documents).

sen.j: 運行経路
sen.e: Operation route
Operation route
Operation route

sen.j: （男山5号経路） 樟葉駅→モール街→あさひ→泉→318棟前→306棟前→男山中央センター商店街前→男山商店街西→金振東（この間にフリー乗降区間あり）→106棟前→面取町2丁目→朝日1丁目→あさひ→くずは
sen.e: Otokoyama No. 5 Route: Kuzuha Station - Shopping Mall - Asahi - Izumi - No. 318 Apartment Front - No. 306 Apartment Front - Otokoyama Central Shopping District Front - Otokoyama Shopping District West - Kanaburi Higashi (there is a "free get on and off section" between Kanaburi Higashi and the next stop) - No. 106 Apartment Front - Mendoricho 2nd district - Asahi 1st district - Asahi - Kuzuha

Otokoyama No. 5 Route: Kuzuha Station - Shopping Mall - Asahi - Izumi - No. 318 Apartment Front - No. 306 Apartment Front - Otokoyama Central Shopping District Front - Otokoyama Shopping District West - Kanaburi Higashi (there is a "free get on and off section" between Kanaburi Higashi and the next stop) - No. 106 Apartment Front - Mendoricho 2nd district - Asahi 1st district - Asahi - Kuzuha
sen.cmt: 不要なスペースを削除しました。
sen.e: Otokoyama No. 5 Route: Kuzuha Station - Shopping Mall - Asahi - Izumi - No. 318 Apartment Front - No. 306 Apartment Front - Otokoyama Central Shopping District Front - Otokoyama Shopping District West - Kanaburi Higashi (there is a "free get on and off section" between Kanaburi Higashi and the next stop) - No. 106 Apartment Front - Mendoricho 2nd district - Asahi 1st district - Asahi - Kuzuha

sen.j: 車両
sen.e: Operating vehicles
Operating vehicles
Operating vehicles

sen.j: 運行開始当初は京阪バス男山営業所に配備され、『バスビィ』として開設された当初から使用されている日野・レインボーの2台と、京阪宇治バス宇治営業所から移籍した日産ディーゼル・RN/ENの1台で運用された。
sen.e: During the earlier days of the operation after the establishment of this bus route, two 'Rainbows' of Hino Motors, Co. Ltd. were assigned to the Keihan Bus Otokoyama Management Office and used as the 'Bus-be,' while one 'RN/EN' of Nissan Diesel Motors, Co. Ltd. was transferred from the Keihan Bus Uji Management Office and also used for the operation.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: During the earlier days of the operation after the establishment of this bus route, two 'Rainbows' of Hino Motors, Co. Ltd. were assigned to the Keihan Bus Otokoyama Management Office and used as the "Bus-be," while one 'RN/EN' of Nissan Diesel Motors, Co. Ltd. was transferred from the Keihan Bus Uji Management Office and also used for the operation.
sen.cmt: 原文の『』に合せて'を"に訂正しました。
sen.e: During the earlier days of the operation after the establishment of this bus route, two 'Rainbows' of Hino Motors, Co. Ltd. were assigned to the Keihan Bus Otokoyama Management Office and used as the "Bus-be," while one 'RN/EN' of Nissan Diesel Motors, Co. Ltd. was transferred from the Keihan Bus Uji Management Office and also used for the operation.

sen.j: 稀にくずは丘コミュニティバスで運用されている三菱ふそう・エアロミディMJが充当されることがあった。
sen.e: Sometimes in rare occasions, the bus managed by the Kuzuha Hillside Community Bus ('Aero Midi MJ' of the Mitsubishi Fuso Truck and Bus Corporation) was allotted for this bus service for temporal usage.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: Sometimes in rare occasions, the bus managed by the Kuzuha Hillside Community Bus ('Aero Midi MJ' of the Mitsubishi Fuso Truck and Bus Corporation) was allotted for this bus service for temporal usage.

Sometimes in rare occasions, the bus managed by the Kuzuha Hillside Community Bus ('Aero Midi MJ' of the Mitsubishi Fuso Truck and Bus Corporation) was allotted for this bus service for temporal usage.

sen.j: かつては、レインボーRBがもう1台予備車となっていたが、現在はコミュニティバスやわたの予備車となっている。
sen.e: Although this bus service used to keep an additional 'Rainbow RB' as a spare vehicle, it was handed over to the Community Bus Yawata Route, and currently it is maintained by the Community Bus Yawata as its spare vehicle.

Although this bus service used to keep an additional 'Rainbow RB' as a spare vehicle, it was handed over to the Community Bus Yawata Route, and currently it is maintained by the Community Bus Yawata as its spare vehicle.

Although this bus service used to keep an additional 'Rainbow RB' as a spare vehicle, it was handed over to the Community Bus Yawata Route, and currently it is maintained by the Community Bus Yawata as its spare vehicle.

sen.j: しかしこれらの車両が大阪府の流入車規制に抵触することとなったため、2008年12月中旬に新造の日野・ポンチョへと置き換えを行った（タウンくると同一仕様）。
sen.e: However, those vehicles could not fulfil and meet the regulation of the Vehicle Emission Control of Osaka Prefecture, they were replaced by the new 'Poncho' of the Hino Motors in mid-December, 2008. (the vehicles share the same specification with the ones obtained by the Keihan Bus Town Kuru Route at the same time)

However, those vehicles could not fulfill and meet the regulation of the Vehicle Emission Control of Osaka Prefecture, they were replaced by the new 'Poncho' of the Hino Motors in mid-December, 2008 (the vehicles share the same specification with the ones obtained by the Keihan Bus Town Kuru Route at the same time.)
sen.cmt: fulfillに訂正しました。ピリオド位置を訂正しました。
sen.e: However, those vehicles could not fulfill and meet the regulation of the Vehicle Emission Control of Osaka Prefecture, they were replaced by the new 'Poncho' of the Hino Motors in mid-December, 2008 (the vehicles share the same specification with the ones obtained by the Keihan Bus Town Kuru Route at the same time.)

sen.j: 同時に全車くずは丘コミュニティバスと共通使用となった。
sen.e: After the launch of those new vehicles, all the vehicles were jointly managed and operated by the Kuzuha Otokoyama Loop-Route Bus and the Kuzuha Hillside Community Bus.
After the launch of those new vehicles, all the vehicles were jointly managed and operated by the Kuzuha Otokoyama Loop-Route Bus and the Kuzuha Hillside Community Bus.
After the launch of those new vehicles, all the vehicles were jointly managed and operated by the Kuzuha Otokoyama Loop-Route Bus and the Kuzuha Hillside Community Bus.

sen.j: 運賃
sen.e: Passenger Fare
Passenger Fare
Passenger Fare

sen.j: 大人210円・小児110円（男山地区特殊区間制・1区）
sen.e: Adult: 210 Yen/Child: 110 Yen (Otokoyama area special route/one district)
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: Adult: 210 yen/Child: 110 yen (Otokoyama area special route/one district)
sen.cmt: yen 小文字に訂正しました。
sen.e: Adult: 210 yen/Child: 110 yen (Otokoyama area special route/one district)

sen.j: スルッとKANSAIのプリペイドカード・京阪グループ共通バスカード・京阪バス1dayチケットなど他の一般路線を同じカードが利用できる。
sen.e: Passengers can use the same pre-paid card of the other public bus routes, such as the 'Sulutto KANSAI Pre-paid Card,' 'Keihan Group Common Bus Card,' 'Keihan Bus 1-day Ticket,' etc..
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: Passengers can use the same pre-paid card of the other public bus routes, such as the 'KANSAI THRU PASS,' 'Keihan Group Common Bus Card,' 'Keihan Bus 1-day Ticket,' etc..
sen.cmt: KANSAI THRU PASSに訂正しました。
sen.e: Passengers can use the same pre-paid card of the other public bus routes, such as the 'KANSAI THRU PASS,' 'Keihan Group Common Bus Card,' 'Keihan Bus 1-day Ticket,' etc..

sen.j: 2008年10月1日よりPiTaPaの使用が可能となった。
sen.e: In addition, the PiTaPa IC card can be used for the ride from October 1, 2008.
In addition, the PiTaPa IC card can be used for the ride from October 1, 2008.
In addition, the PiTaPa IC card can be used for the ride from October 1, 2008.

sen.j: その他
sen.e: Other notes
Other notes
Other notes

sen.j: この経路のうち、男山商店街西停留所の先より金振西停留所の先までの金振地区住宅地にあるフリー乗降区間は、京阪バス全経路を通じて唯一である。
sen.e: The section of the route set up as the "free get on and off section," which is designated at the residential area of Kanaburi district, (more specifically the section of the route between Otokoyama Shopping District West bus stop and Kanaburi Nishi bus stop) is the service available only in this route among all the bus routes of the Keihan Bus Co. Ltd.

The section of the route set up as the "free get on and off section," which is designated at the residential area of Kanaburi district, (more specifically the section of the route between Otokoyama Shopping District West bus stop and Kanaburi Nishi bus stop) is the service available only in this route among all the bus routes of the Keihan Bus Co. Ltd.

The section of the route set up as the "free get on and off section," which is designated at the residential area of Kanaburi district, (more specifically the section of the route between Otokoyama Shopping District West bus stop and Kanaburi Nishi bus stop) is the service available only in this route among all the bus routes of the Keihan Bus Co. Ltd.

sen.j: これは山間部にあるそれとは意味合いが異なり、前述の通り高齢者などの交通弱者に対する配慮をすることを目的としたものである。
sen.e: Unlike those similar services found in the mountainous regions, where only a limited number of bus stop is allowed to set up because of their topographic conditions, this "free get on and off section" service was introduced in consideration to those people of advanced age, who have less accessibility to the bus stops away from their home.
sen.cmt: 説明の足りない原文の意味を取りやすくするため多少の意訳追加説明を加えました。
sen.e: Unlike those similar services found in the mountainous regions, where only a limited number of bus stop is allowed to set up because of their topographic conditions, this "free get on and off section" service was introduced in consideration to those people of advanced age, who have less accessibility to the bus stops away from their home.

Unlike those similar services found in the mountainous regions, where only a limited number of bus stop is allowed to set up because of their topographic conditions, this "free get on and off section" service was introduced in consideration to those people of advanced age, who have less accessibility to the bus stops away from their home.

sen.j: 乗車の際には手を上げて知らせ、降車の際はボタンを押した上で運転手に降りる場所を知らせる方式である。
sen.e: This is a simple service allowing to get on and off at any point within the designated section of the route, by notifying the bus driver by raising a hand to get on, or pressing a notification signal button to get off.

This is a simple service allowing to get on and off at any point within the designated section of the route, by notifying the bus driver by raising a hand to get on, or pressing a notification signal button to get off.

This is a simple service allowing to get on and off at any point within the designated section of the route, by notifying the bus driver by raising a hand to get on, or pressing a notification signal button to get off.

sen.j: 前名称の『バスビィ』は、京阪宇治交通の内部でさまざまなシーンで用いられており、『バスビィ介護サービス』や『地ビール・バスビィ（スタウト・アルト・ピルスナー）』と、京阪宇治交通が目指した多角化する事業名に名づけられていた（現在はいずれもサービス自体が消滅し運営主体の京阪宇治交サービスも会社を解散している）。
sen.e: The previous nickname of the bus service, the 'Bus-be,' was used in various services and projects initiated by the Keihan Uji Transport Co. Ltd. as the company tried for diverse business management and operation, such as the 'Bus-be Nursing Care Service' or the 'Local Beer Bus-be.' (the project produced Stout/ Altbier/ Pilsner type beers) However, the principle management body the Keihan Uji Transportation Service Co. Ltd. was dismissed, and all the services provided by the company had been terminated.

The previous nickname of the bus service, the "Bus-be," was used in various services and projects initiated by the Keihan Uji Transport Co. Ltd. as the company tried for diverse business management and operation, such as the "Bus-be Nursing Care Service" or the "Local Beer Bus-be" (the project produced Stout/ Altbier/ Pilsner type beers) (However, the principle management body the Keihan Uji Transportation Service Co. Ltd. was dismissed, and all the services provided by the company had been terminated.)
sen.cmt: 原文の『』に合せて'を"に訂正しました。ピリオド削除しました。()補足しました。
sen.e: The previous nickname of the bus service, the "Bus-be," was used in various services and projects initiated by the Keihan Uji Transport Co. Ltd. as the company tried for diverse business management and operation, such as the "Bus-be Nursing Care Service" or the "Local Beer Bus-be" (the project produced Stout/ Altbier/ Pilsner type beers) (However, the principle management body the Keihan Uji Transportation Service Co. Ltd. was dismissed, and all the services provided by the company had been terminated.)

sen.j: かつて使用されていたレインボーRBの2台については、ファンの間で『ガーデンズカラー』と呼ばれている黄色地にオリジナルキャラクターの描かれているラッピングが施されている。
sen.e: Those two 'Rainbow RB' buses once operated for this route were applied with a body design in yellow base color (this color is called the 'Garden's Color' among those vehicle fans) and original character illustration.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: Those two 'Rainbow RB' buses once operated for this route were applied with a body design in yellow base color (this color is called the "Garden's Color" among those vehicle fans) and original character illustration.
sen.cmt: 原文の『』に合せて'を"に訂正しました。
sen.e: Those two 'Rainbow RB' buses once operated for this route were applied with a body design in yellow base color (this color is called the "Garden's Color" among those vehicle fans) and original character illustration.

sen.j: これは『地ビール・バスビィ』を販売していた『ガーデンズ天ヶ瀬』という施設の宣伝のためのものであった（現在はその施設については閉鎖されている）。
sen.e: This design was applied for advertising the facility called 'Gardens Amagase,' because the facility was selling the 'Local Beer Bus-be.' (this facility is not in service as of today)
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処。括弧内で、「現在は”その施設については”閉鎖されている」と書かれていますが、これでは未だに地ビール・バスビィをバス広告で宣伝しているかのように取れます。セル49では全てのサービスが消滅したと説明されていますので、話の流れからは「その施設も」が正しいと思います。
sen.e: This design was applied for advertising the facility called "Gardens Amagase," because the facility was selling the "Local Beer Bus-be" (this facility is not in service as of today).
sen.cmt: 原文の『』に合せて'を"に訂正しました。ピリオド位置を訂正しました。
sen.e: This design was applied for advertising the facility called "Gardens Amagase," because the facility was selling the "Local Beer Bus-be" (this facility is not in service as of today).
